feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.16.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add generic "import" endpoint to API by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/185
  • Add weight-based workout icons by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/186
  • Remove dependency on sorttable by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/187
  • Improve the list of workout details, to show non-GPX-based workout deâ€¦ by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/188

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.16.1...v1.16.2

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.16.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Don't show missing location when not location based by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/189
  • Set Creator (source) when adding workout via web ui by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/190
  • Don't ask for location when adding workout without location by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/191

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.16.2...v1.16.3

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.16.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Explicitly show if no equipment was used by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/192
  • Add Italian to the list of automatically-updated translations by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/193
  • Show what other metrics are contained in the workout by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/195
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/194

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.16.3...v1.16.4

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.16.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Parse extention nodes and standardize extra metric names by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/196
  • Create nb_NO.json by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/197
  • Add Norwegian as a language in the app by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/198
  • Add some basic way to show custom statistic ranges by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/199
  • Add options to change the range and bucket size of statistics by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/200
  • Add more ranges by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/201
  • Skip updates for non-GPX based workouts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/203

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.16.4...v1.16.5

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.17.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add a changelog system and the changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/204
  • Update meta-information and add extra Weblate link by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/207
  • Add support to update manually added workouts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/208
  • Improve input of location for manual workouts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/209
  • Allow partial location by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/210
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/211
  • Automate changelog commit (and exclude changelog updates from changelog) by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/212
  • Exclude some commits from the changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/213

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.16.5...v1.17.0
